original_text: There were 2,700 men from Jeriah's clan who were good leaders in their families. King David chose them to be officers with authority for the tribes of Reuben, Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh. They had authority for all the work that people did to serve the Lord and the king.
korean_text: 그의 형제 중 이천칠백 명이 다 용사요 가문의 우두머리라 다윗 왕이 그들로 르우벤과 갓과 므낫세 반 지파를 주관하여 하나님의 모든 일과 왕의 일을 다스리게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: There were 2,700 men from Jeriah's clan
who were good leaders in their families
King David chose them to be officers
with authority for the tribes of Reuben, Gad
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 르우벤과 갓 지파에게 권위를 가졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and the half tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 므낫세 반 지파에게도 권위를 가졌습니다

sentences.original_text: They had authority for all the work
that people did to serve the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 주님을 섬기기 위해 하는 일에
